news.title: Welcome to EUREKA!
news.content:
Eurêka is an online collaborative platform that empowers the PagesJaunes group and the employees to bring the best ideas and top talent. Let's bear on our challenges all together !
The floor is yours: share your ideas and innovation with all the Group's employees. Thanks to your submissions, be a leading innovation actor !
Come and support the ideas: vote for your preferred submission, discuss and post comments.
This program belongs to you: help us to make it greater with any improvement suggestions
Each time you post an idea or a comment, each time you vote, and once your idea is retained, you may gain Eurêka points !
For any question, do not hesitate to contact your Facilitator, or e-mail to candriamadison@pagesjaunes.fr
